Sentencas: This study developed a clean hybrid power plant using a combination of integrated torrefied biomass co-gasification (TBCG), solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), and calcium looping (CaL) CO2 capture.
Titulo: Design and thermodynamic analysis of a hybrid power plant using torrefied biomass and coal blends

Sentencas: Based on pre-SOFC (Design I) and post-SOFC (Design II) configurations, thermodynamic analysis is adopted to examine the performance of hybrid power generation plants.
Titulo: Design and thermodynamic analysis of a hybrid power plant using torrefied biomass and coal blends

Sentencas: The carbon boundary points (CBPs) for different torrefied biomass blending ratios (TBBRs) are found using specific optimization algorithms to maximize the syngas yield.
Titulo: Design and thermodynamic analysis of a hybrid power plant using torrefied biomass and coal blends

Sentencas: From the viewpoint of energy utilization, the simulation results show that Design I is superior to Design II.
Titulo: Design and thermodynamic analysis of a hybrid power plant using torrefied biomass and coal blends

Sentencas: However, the CO2 emissions of Design II are lower than those of Design I by 94.19%, although it has an accompanying energy penalty of 4.17%.
Titulo: Design and thermodynamic analysis of a hybrid power plant using torrefied biomass and coal blends

Sentencas: Due to its use of the internal heat recovery approach, the energy penalty of Design II falls to 1.09%.
Titulo: Design and thermodynamic analysis of a hybrid power plant using torrefied biomass and coal blends

Sentencas: As a whole, Design II with the heat integration design is recommended for use in hybrid power plants.
Titulo: Design and thermodynamic analysis of a hybrid power plant using torrefied biomass and coal blends
